languages.text: Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.
languages.original_text: Позволяет {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воину{/g}, не имеющему {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, использовать медкомплекты. Также воин получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно, когда его лечат с помощью медкомплекта.

traits.locale_text: Allows the Fighter to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill. Also, the Fighter gains additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.

Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.

Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}可以在没有{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}的情况下使用医疗包。此外，每当对战士使用医疗包时，战士会额外恢复{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.

traits.locale_text: 战士可以在没有{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能的情况下使用医疗包。此外，每当对战士使用医疗包时，战士会额外恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>战士的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}可以在没有{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能的情况下使用医疗包。此外，每当对战士使用医疗包时，战士会额外恢复{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Permite al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} usar botiquines sin la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Además, el guerrero gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} cada vez que se usa un botiquín sobre él.
languages.original_text: Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.

traits.locale_text: Permite al guerrero usar botiquines sin la habilidad {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Además, el guerrero gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} cada vez que se usa un botiquín sobre él.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキルなしにメディキットを使えるようになる。さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}回復にメディキットを使うときはいつでも、 +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}が発生する。
languages.original_text: Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill. Also, the Warrior gains an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキルなしにメディキットを使えるようになる。さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}回復にメディキットを使うときはいつでも、 +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}が発生する。

Также воин получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно, когда его лечат с помощью медкомплекта.
languages.original_text: Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. traits.locale_text: Позволяет бойцу, не имеющему навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, использовать медкомплекты. Также боец получает +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно, когда его лечат с помощью медкомплекта.

Позволяет бойцу, не имеющему навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, использовать медкомплекты. Также боец получает +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно, когда его лечат с помощью медкомплекта.

languages.text: Ermöglicht dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g}, Medikits ohne die Fertigkeit {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} zu nutzen. Der Krieger erhält außerdem zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, immer wenn ein Medikit auf ihn angewendet wird.
languages.original_text: Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.

traits.locale_text: Ermöglicht dem Krieger, Medikits ohne die Fertigkeit {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} zu nutzen. Der Krieger erhält außerdem zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, immer wenn ein Medikit auf ihn angewendet wird.

languages.text: Permet au {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} d'utiliser des médikits sans la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Par ailleurs, le guerrier bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} supplémentaires chaque fois qu'un médikit est utilisé sur lui.
languages.original_text: Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.

traits.locale_text: Permet au Combattant d'utiliser des médikits sans la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Par ailleurs, le Combattant bénéficie de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} supplémentaires chaque fois qu'un médikit est utilisé sur lui.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı'nın{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yeteneği{/g} olmadan sıhhiye çantası kullanabilmesini sağlar. Ayrıca Savaşçı, kendi üzerinde her sıhhiye çantası kullandığında +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
